title: Uli Jon Roth - The Electric Sun Years Vol. I & II - Historic Per
description:
Uli Jon Roth - The Electric Sun Years Vol. I & II - Historic Performances (2001)

\"Exclusively devoted to Uli\&#039;s early Electric Sun period (1978 to 1983), 
Historic Performances Voumnes I & II is a 2 hour plus DVD containing previously
unreleased promotional videos followed by various concert performances from that time.
The footage was selected from Uli Jon Roth\&#039;s personal archives and has been made
available to the public for the first time. Highlights include the 1979 Electric
Sun Amsterdam studio appearances, featuring four songs from the Earthquake album,
excerpts from the legendary Newcastle City Hall concert in 1983 and much more.
Musicians include Ule W. Ritgen (bass, backing vocals), Sidhatta Guatama (drums),
Clive Bunker (drums), Simon Fox (drums, percussion), David Lennox (keyboards),
Jenni Evans (vocals), Dorothy Patterson (vocals) and of course, Uli Jon Roth
(guitar, vocals).\"

Track List:

(Amsterdam 1979/1980)

1. LILAC
2. ELECTRIC SUN
3. SUNDOWN
4. EARTHQUAKE
5. JAPANESE DREAM

(Mulhouse 1982)

1. FIRE WIND
2. VIRGIN KILLER
3. FREE JAM ENCORE
4. MUTRON JAM
5. RED HOUSE BLUES

(Sweden/UK 1983)

1. ICE BREAKER
2. WHAT IS LOVE?
3. WHY?
4. ENOLA GAY-HIROSHIMA TODAY?
5. ANGEL OF PEACE
6. RETURN
7. CAST AWAY YOUR CHAINS
8. VIRGIN KILLER
9. DRUM PERCUSSION SOLO
10. ELECTRIC SUN
11. POLAR NIGHTS
12. BEETHOVEN PARAPHRASE
13. HELL CAT
14. DARK LADY
15. MIDNIGHT SUN
